content.text:
Look at the following description corresponding the the relavant image(s), Then answer a question

***Start of description***

The first image shows a musical bar in compound time with a time signature of 6/8. The bar contains a dotted quarter note followed by an eighth note, then a quarter note tied to an eighth note, and finally a quarter note.

The second image presents three options for rewriting the bar in simple time:

- Option A: The bar has a time signature of 4/4. It starts with a dotted quarter note followed by an eighth note, then a quarter note tied to an eighth note, and finally a quarter note.
- Option B: The bar has a time signature of 2/4. It starts with a dotted quarter note followed by an eighth note, then a quarter note tied to an eighth note, and finally a quarter note.
- Option C: The bar has a time signature of 3/4. It starts with a dotted quarter note followed by an eighth note, then a quarter note tied to an eighth note, and finally a quarter note.

Each option has a different time signature but the same rhythmic pattern as the original bar in compound time.

***End of description***
Now, answer the question:

<image 1><image 2>

A. box 1
B. box 2
C. box 3
D. None of above
